metadata.title: I Played Every AI Game I Got An Ad For
metadata.author: BENOFTHEWEEK

key_facts: The creator attempted to find the worst mobile game ever created a couple of years ago.
AI is now pervasive in mobile gaming and advertising, generating entire content ecosystems.
The creator received an ad for 'Pregnant Talking Cat Emma' after playing other games.
The game 'Pregnant Talking Cat Emma' features a cat character with a growing belly and pregnancy-themed gameplay.
The game includes a scene titled 'Emma's exam room' with blood pressure monitoring mechanics.
The game allows players to name their cat, including options like 'white demon' and 'Native American Kitty'.
The game has multiple spin-off titles such as Emma Ballerina, Emma Gardener, Kimmy Superstar, and Anna.
A user encountered an ad leading to 'Capuccina', a game about making lasagna with ketchup as an ingredient.
The game 'Capuccina' is described as nearly unusable and not authentic to Italian cuisine.
Clicking on the 'Capuccina' ad redirects to 'Dr. Game Surgeon Hospital', a game involving emergency medical responses.
The game 'Dr. Game Surgeon Hospital' features a burning city, multiplayer mode, and driving mechanics.
The game 'Match Phillip Trademark Makeup ASMR' includes disturbing content like body hair and scabies references.
The game 'Idle Honey Bee Factory Tycoon' has a one-star rating and is described as a copy of a popular movie.
The game 'Super Draw' allows users to draw pandas and other characters, but the app is criticized for poor art quality.
An AI-generated ad showed Jesus made from a sand castle being destroyed by Nickelodeon slime.
The AI Jesus ad links to an app called 'Talk with Jesus', which charges $9.99 per month for access.
The AI Jesus app claims to embody love, compassion, and wisdom despite not being a physical presence.
Users are told that the AI Jesus can discuss ice cream flavors and share emotional experiences.
One response from the AI Jesus involves taking children’s ice cream and dumping it on the ground.
The creator believes the AI Jesus app could cause religious psychosis in vulnerable users.
The game 'Ants Underground Kingdom' is described as looking like 'slop' and filled with bots and fake ads.
The creator feels a sense of 'nameless dread' when playing these AI-generated games.
The creator warns of 'quality collapse' where people may forget what handmade media feels like.
The creator concludes that the worst AI game is 'Pregnant Talking Cow' and the worst AI ad is 'Bug Backs'.
key_opinions: The creator believes society is becoming a self-consuming loop due to AI-generated content.
The creator views AI-generated mobile games as the last remaining art form to be corrupted.
The creator thinks the game 'Pregnant Talking Cat Emma' contains deeply racist elements.
The creator finds the game's dialogue and naming system offensive and inappropriate.
The creator believes the use of Native American imagery as a cat name is culturally insensitive.
The creator considers the inclusion of 'ketchup in lasagna' to be a sign of cultural ignorance.
The creator finds the 'Dr. Game Surgeon Hospital' game to be overly chaotic and disturbing.
The creator feels the AI Jesus app crosses ethical and religious boundaries.
The creator believes the AI Jesus app could lead to psychological harm in elderly or devout users.
The creator sees the AI-generated pimple-popping game as grotesque and emotionally triggering.
The creator believes the AI-generated honey bee factory game is poorly designed and unengaging.
The creator thinks the AI-generated sand castle Jesus scene is sacrilegious and disturbing.
The creator feels that AI is eroding the authenticity of human creativity and craftsmanship.
The creator believes that even simple apps like 'Talking Angela' will soon be indistinguishable from AI content.
The creator expresses disgust at the idea of paying $9.99 to talk to an AI pretending to be Jesus.
The creator believes the endless cycle of AI ads and games reflects societal decay.
The creator thinks the developer of the worst game should be publicly shamed and punished.
The creator believes the current state of mobile gaming represents a failure of creative integrity.
The creator feels that AI-generated content lacks soul and emotional resonance.
The creator suggests that future generations may not recognize non-AI-created media as genuine.
The creator believes the worst AI game should be banned or removed from app stores.
The creator feels that the proliferation of AI content is accelerating cultural degradation.
The creator views the AI Jesus app as a symptom of deeper societal disconnection from reality.
The creator believes that AI is replacing meaningful human interaction with hollow simulations.
The creator thinks the entire ecosystem of AI games and ads is built on deception and manipulation.
key_datapoints: The game 'Pregnant Talking Cat Emma' has been played for two weeks without the cat giving birth.
The game 'Capuccina' has only one review, which says it makes lasagna bad.
The game 'Idle Honey Bee Factory Tycoon' has a singular one-star rating.
The AI Jesus app costs $9.99 per month for priority support.
The creator mentions having 1 million followers on Instagram.
The game 'Dr. Game Surgeon Hospital' features a burning city as a primary objective.
The game 'Match Phillip Trademark Makeup ASMR' includes a line about putting someone down like a dollar.
The game 'Super Draw' allows users to draw a panda, which the app then critiques as terrible.
The game 'Ants Underground Kingdom' is described as having dead gameplay and bot activity.
The game 'Dr. Game Surgeon Hospital' includes a multiplayer feature and driving mechanics.
The game 'Idle Honey Bee Factory Tycoon' requires collecting 15 good hunting cubes to progress.
The game 'Super Draw' includes a feature to learn how to draw a super cool panda.
The game 'Pregnant Talking Cat Emma' includes a relaxation salon minigame.
The game 'Capuccina' teaches how to layer lasagna with pasta, ketchup, salt, and sauce.
The AI Jesus app responds to questions about ice cream with peanut butter fudge as a favorite flavor.
The AI Jesus app claims to enjoy sharing ice cream with others, though it describes dumping it on the ground.
The game 'Dr. Game Surgeon Hospital' includes characters with conditions like HIV, AIDS, stomach aches, and brain tumors.
The game 'Match Phillip Trademark Makeup ASMR' includes a gag about body hair and scabies.
The game 'Idle Honey Bee Factory Tycoon' features a town that looks like Indianapolis.
The game 'Pregnant Talking Cat Emma' includes a mechanic where the player must click 'okay' to proceed.
The game 'Dr. Game Surgeon Hospital' includes a scene where the player drives through chairs.
The game 'Super Draw' includes a feature where users can draw and receive feedback.
The game 'Idle Honey Bee Factory Tycoon' includes a flying mechanic after an accident.
The game 'Pregnant Talking Cat Emma' includes a feature where the player can pose to see if the cat gives birth.
The game 'Dr. Game Surgeon Hospital' includes a scene where the player picks up victims after an accident.
